definitions.definition: To be on or form the border of.
examples: The plain was skirted by rows of trees.

definitions.definition: To move around or along the border of; to avoid the center of.
To cover with a skirt; to surround.
To avoid or ignore (something); to manage to avoid (something or a problem); to skate by (something).
examples: He skirted the issue of which parties to attend by staying at home instead.

main_definition: To be on or form the border of.
secondary_definitions: To move around or along the border of; to avoid the center of.
To cover with a skirt; to surround.
( figurative ) To avoid or ignore (something); to manage to avoid (something or a problem); to skate by (something).
